valuePropositions.title: Get perfectly matched
valuePropositions.description: Our AI understands your goals and connects you with experts who've solved your exact challenges. No more guessing who can help.

valuePropositions.title: Book instantly
valuePropositions.description: See real results from past sessions, read detailed reviews, and book the perfect time slot. Your breakthrough is just clicks away.

valuePropositions.title: Get results that matter
valuePropositions.description: Walk away with a clear action plan, insider knowledge, and the confidence to execute. Every session is designed for immediate impact.

featuredSection.title: Learn From The Best
featuredSection.subtitle: Get personalized advice and strategic insights from successful founders, seasoned executives, and proven innovators who've already built the companies, products, and careers you're dreaming of achieving

experts.name: Isabella Grace Harrington
experts.title: Founder of TechNova
experts.bio: Built and scaled TechNova from idea to $100M valuation. Expert in product-market fit and raising Series A-C funding.

experts.title: Founder of BloomWell Skincare
experts.bio: Bootstrapped BloomWell to $50M revenue. Expert in DTC marketing, brand strategy, and scaling operations.

experts.bio: Led product teams at Microsoft for 8+ years. Expert in product roadmaps, team management, and enterprise software.

experts.bio: Built marketing teams that drove 10x growth at 3 startups. Expert in growth loops, conversion optimization, and paid acquisition.

experts.bio: Built scalable systems serving 100M+ users. Expert in cloud architecture, team scaling, and technical strategy.

experts.bio: Scaled sales teams from 5 to 50+ reps. Expert in enterprise sales, pipeline management, and revenue optimization.

experts.name: David Rodriguez

experts.bio: Optimized operations for billion-dollar companies. Expert in lean methodology, supply chain, and operational efficiency.

reviews.title: Success Stories
reviews.subtitle: Real breakthroughs from real people who took action with expert guidance

testimonials.name: Alex Chen
testimonials.title: Product Manager at Stripe
testimonials.text: One 15-minute session gave me the exact framework I needed. Landed my dream PM role at Stripe within 2 months.

testimonials.name: Sarah Williams
testimonials.title: Startup Founder
testimonials.text: My expert walked me through their actual pitch deck. We closed our $2M Series A using their exact strategy.

testimonials.name: Michael Rodriguez
testimonials.title: UX Designer
testimonials.text: They showed me what top-tier portfolios really look like. Got callbacks from Google, Apple, and Figma in one week.

testimonials.name: Jessica Thompson
testimonials.title: Marketing Director
testimonials.text: The growth strategies they shared transformed our conversion rate from 2% to 8% in just 3 weeks.

testimonials.name: David Park
testimonials.title: Software Engineer
testimonials.text: Finally understood system design after years of struggling. Passed my Google interview on the first try.

testimonials.name: Emily Foster
testimonials.title: Sales Manager
testimonials.text: Their closing techniques increased my deal size by 40%. Best investment I've ever made in my career.

testimonials.name: James Wilson
testimonials.title: Startup Founder
testimonials.text: They helped me avoid critical mistakes that would have cost us months. We launched 6 weeks ahead of schedule.

testimonials.name: Rachel Green
testimonials.title: Product Designer
testimonials.text: Learned design thinking frameworks that instantly improved my user research process. Promotion followed within 2 months.

testimonials.name: Kevin Martinez

testimonials.text: The financial modeling techniques they taught me landed me a role at Goldman Sachs. Incredible ROI.

testimonials.name: Lisa Chang
testimonials.title: HR Director

testimonials.name: Amanda Lewis
